description: These Enchilada Lentil Tacos have incredible depth of flavour! The lentils are cooked in a spicy enchilada sauce on the stove or in the slow cooker, then tucked inside tacos & topped with zesty lime slaw. The saucy lentils are also great for enchiladas, burritos, quesadillas or just served on rice.
name: Enchilada Lentil Tacos with Lime Slaw
recipeIngredient: 300g | 1 1/2 cups uncooked green lentils (, or brown. NOT red)
1/4 cup nutritional yeast (, optional but adds depth to the flavour)
796ml | 28 fl oz | 3 1/3 cups canned crushed tomatoes (, or passata)
500g | around 5 cups shredded | 1/2 small red cabbage (, you can use white cabbage instead or a mix of both)

recipeInstructions.text: Add all of the Enchilada Lentil ingredients (except the lentils and the salt) to a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into your slow cooker, add the lentils, stir and turn your slow cooker on high for around 4 hours or low for 6-7 hours.
Add the salt once the lentils have cooked and stir well.
